mapper.sql: yascmf_datas.id AS id, yascmf_datas.model AS model, yascmf_datas.instrument_id AS instrumentId, yascmf_datas.date_time AS dateTime, yascmf_datas.coordinate AS coordinate, yascmf_datas.ph AS ph, yascmf_datas.conductivity AS conductivity, yascmf_datas.water_temperature AS waterTemperature, yascmf_datas.ammonia_nitrogen AS ammoniaNitrogen, yascmf_datas.dissolved_oxygen AS dissolvedOxygen, yascmf_datas.level AS level, yascmf_datas.exception AS exception, yascmf_datas.ntu AS ntu, yascmf_datas.P AS p
id, model, instrument_id, date_time, coordinate, ph, conductivity, water_temperature, ammonia_nitrogen, dissolved_oxygen, level, exception, ntu, P

id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, model = #{model,jdbcType=INTEGER}, instrument_id = #{instrumentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date_time = #{dateTime}, coordinate = #{coordinate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ph = #{ph,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, conductivity = #{conductivity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, water_temperature = #{waterTemperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ammonia_nitrogen = #{ammoniaNitrogen,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, dissolved_oxygen = #{dissolvedOxygen,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, level = #{level,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, exception = #{exception,jdbcType=BIT}, ntu = #{ntu,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, P = #{p,jdbcType=DOUBLE}
mapper.select:
SELECT FROM yasi.yascmf_datas
ORDER BY id DESC;
